		                    Stage III Salivary Gland Cancer
		                    Treatment for stage III salivary gland cancer depends on whether the cancer is low-grade (slow growing) or high-grade (fast growing).   If the cancer is low-grade, treatment may include the following:         -  Surgery with or without lymphadenectomy. Radiation therapy may also be giv
